mapper.select: select * from WISH where mem_no = #{mem_no} and host_no = #{host_no}
select w.mem_no, w.host_no, h.imagename, h.name, h.addr1, h.addr2, h.zip, h.tel from wish w, host h, member m where h.no = w.host_no and m.no = w.mem_no and m.no = #{mem_no}
mapper.delete: delete from WISH where mem_no = #{mem_no} and host_no = #{host_no}
